name: Expit
tag_list: system-center, scom, sccm, scsm, scvmm, virtualization
overview:
Expit is an IT management consulting and professional services firm. The organization is based out of Kuwait and operates in the gulf state region as of 2011. Expit focuses on delivering services and developing software for the Microsoft System Center platform. The current activitie of the firm include the following:

System Center design and implementation services, this service category includes a. Operations management using operations manager (SCOM) b. Configuration management using configuration manager (SCCM) c. Service management using service manager (SCSM) d. Data protection using (DPM) e. Virtualization management using Virtual Machine Manager (SCVMM)

Log Management and Event intelligence services focusing on IT security and compliance requirements a. PCI-DSS compliance technology b. Event collection, correlation, analysis c. Enterprise Security posture

Unified communication and EPM technologies design and implementation services d. Lync Server design and implementation services e. Microsoft project server design and implementation services
